presentation.name: Bruno Tatsuya
presentation.description: Architecting reliable systems that scale and deliver <underline>real impact</underline>.

about.title: Reliability with intent
about.description: I'm Bruno, a backend engineer and computer scientist with 7+ years building cloud-native platforms across fintech and B2B products. EU-based and currently at Qonto, I focus on reliability foundations, clear domain boundaries, and measurable business impact so products scale without slowing teams down.
